title: I want an option to prefent in-client downloading while in-game
body:
Because my MS skyrockets when this happens making the game next to unplayable.

I don't want to close the client while in-game, I know that option exists, because it takes way too long to get into the client already. I don't want to go through that after every single game.

replies.body:
Hey there,

My apologies for such a late response to this.

From what I can find, the client will not patch (Download) anything while you are in-game. Perhaps you have other programs running that are causing your issues, or perhaps your connection simply isn't good enough to handle league.

Are you using a wired or a wireless connection?
